data.name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack includes the unique playable character Castellan Garran Crowe*, and the Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters Original Soundtrack.

*Unlocked through a timeline event in the main story campaign.

CASTELLAN GARRAN CROWE

A flawless soul entrusted with one of the Grey Knights’ most heinous possessions: the Black Blade of Antwyr. Add Garran Crowe to your Strike Force and bring righteous fury against all foes, be they Cultist or Daemonkind.

ORIGINAL GAME SOUNDTRACK

Transport yourself to the Warhammer 40,000 universe with the epic tracks (plus one bonus track) from the game. Brought to you by famed composer Doyle W. Donehoo.

data.short_description: The Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack includes the unique playable character Castellan Garran Crowe, and the Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters Original Soundtrack.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Violence against human and fantasy characters, dismemberment, depictions of realistic violence of a minor nature towards a human-like or animal-like character that does not result in any obvious injury or harm, depictions of realistic looking violence towards fantasy characters
